landing.tagline: Who lived knows. Do they really? Test your knowledge now
landing.subtitle: Create fun quizzes about your love story and challenge your guests to discover how much they really know about you

pricing.title: Choose the perfect plan
pricing.subtitle: Start for free and upgrade as your wedding grows

additionalGuests.title: Need more guests?
additionalGuests.subtitle: Add more guests for just $5 per 30 people

cancel.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription anytime without cancellation fees.

exceed.question: What happens if I exceed the guest limit?
exceed.answer: You'll be notified and can upgrade or add extra guests before activating the quiz.

changePlan.question: Can I change plans later?
changePlan.answer: Of course! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan anytime.

dataRetention.question: Is data saved if I cancel?
dataRetention.answer: Your quizzes are saved for 30 days after cancellation in case you want to reactivate.
